author: cms-tau-pog
body:
#### PR description:
In this development code of the anti-electron tauID is refactored as follows:
1. Tau and electron type specific versions of the anti-e tauID producer (`TauDiscriminationAgainstElectronMVA6`) and an algorithm executed by the producer (`AntiElectronIDMVA6`) are merged each into one template version;
2. Code rationalization and cleaning preformed;
3. Explicit cfi configuration files replaced by auto-generated ones.

Modifications introduced in this PR are purely technical and therefore are expected that they **do not change** output of the modified anti-electron tauID.

#### PR validation:
Matrix tests (`runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`) successful.
title: Refactoring of anti-electron tauID
